title: Final Project Billing and Archiving
description: An agent must perform the final administrative tasks for a completed project.

tasks.description: Generate the final invoice for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the final invoice.

tasks.description: Mark the project as 'Completed' in the project management system.
Archive all project documents to the long-term storage server.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates the archival process.
